response.overview: Short film featuring the band The Housemartins made by the BBC in August 1986 and broadcast on 20th September as part of the programme called "Rock Around the Clock."  Includes behind the scenes discussions and interview in Hull as well as live musical performances.  This programme also includes the following songs: The Mighty Ship Sheep We're Not Deep Think For A Minute Caravan Of Love (acapella) Drop Down Dead* Get Up Off Our Knees* Anxious* Flag Day* Me and the Farmer* Rap Around The Clock* Think For A Minute (different version)  *Live performance at the Tower Nightclub in Hull 24th August, 1986
response.title: The Housmartins London 0 Hull 4
